moves.1. e4: I usually open this way too.
moves.1... g6: I have done this to move out my dark squared bishop to finchetto
moves.2. d4 e6 3. c4 c5 4. d5 exd5 5. cxd5 d6: I finially get my dsb out
moves.7... Nf6: I develop my knight which could let me castle on the kingside.
moves.8. h3 O-O: I castle O-O. I tuck my king to a safer place.
moves.9... b5: !This is a blunder, I should be developing my minor pieces . I also have left a hanging pawn! Wight has 2 attacking pieces to gobble my pawn.
moves.10. O-O: white decides to castle now instead of taking my pawn
moves.10... b4: I have developed a 3 pawn string.
moves.11. Ne2: white retreats a knight from the pawn attack!
moves.11... Ba6: I have develop a lsb, but it could be traded by white. I think I am being aggressive since I am playing a much higher rated player.
moves.12. Bxa6: swap in progress, she take the lsb
moves.12... Nxa6: I take back with my knight to complete the swap. My knight is the rim which is grim asI only have 2 squares covered at this time!
moves.13... Nd7: ? blunder I retreat a knight and leave my other knight to be taken!
moves.15. Qd3: She retreat her queen, maybe my covered knight was enough to get her to go away for at least now
moves.15... c4: continue to pressure the queen away
this is a fork. very nice tacticle move.
moves.20... Qf6 21. Nxf8 Rxf8: I take back the Knight with my rook.
moves.22. Bxh6 Qxh6: seemed like a free piece. but was it really?
moves.25. Nxd2: takes back by her knight.    Black is -5 at this point.  White is up 5.
moves.25... Na4 26. Nxc4 Rc8 27. Nxd6 Rc2: I like this move and usually do this about now to attack.
moves.28. Nxf5: white moves knight to allow the passed pawn to advance farther.
moves.28... Nc5 29. Rdc1: white sets up trade of rooks. White is up 8 this is a good move by white!
moves.29... Rxc1: I take and get to -3 for a short period of time
moves.30. Rxc1: exchange completed white is back up 8
moves.30... Nd3: I have to move my knight or it will be taken by whites rook.
moves.31. Rc8#: with placement of knight on f5   white  puts me in mate by rook to c8  game over!

gameName: Walking the Walk & Learning to Run Welcome MT Pt.8
